newsitem.title: TURKEY: Turkey sells record 311.1 trln lira 365-day bonds.
newsitem.headline: Turkey sells record 311.1 trln lira 365-day bonds.

text.p: The Treasury sold a record 311.1 trillion lira of nominal-value one-year bonds in an auction on Friday at an average yield of 121.77 percent, down sharply from the 130.72 percent yield in the previous 238-day auction on October 8.
The 365-day t-bills have the longest maturity issued since August 1995.
The central bank said bids totalled a record 1,011 trillion lira for the papers with October 30, 1997 maturity.
